entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Murdochville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:05 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to periods of drizzle near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High 7. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 3. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 4. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow or periods of rain. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High 7. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
